original_text: And believers were the more added to the Lord, multitudes both of men and women.)
korean_text: 믿고 주께로 나아오는 자가 더 많으니 남녀의 큰 무리더라

sentences.original_text: And believers were more added to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 믿는 자들이 주께 더 많이 더해졌으며

sentences.original_text: multitudes both of men and women
